column4: Thank's for your time. I'll have to research this another time.
OUCH! It didn't like .avi's at all. It sounded like "cat /dev/random | /dev/dsp"  :-(
odd. can you play wave files?
Hang on. I'll see if I can find one. I think so though. The "system sounds" are wav's I think.
nope. dead silent. I'll have to go now anyway but thanks for your help.
